title: Stadia 4.6 for Android prepares motion controls, touch gamepad revamp, more
content:
The latest update to the Stadia app for Android points to Google’s game streaming service gaining motion controls, a revamped touch gamepad, and more.

more…

The post Stadia 4.6 for Android prepares motion controls, touch gamepad revamp, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The latest update to the Stadia app for Android points to the service gaining motion controls, a revamped touch gamepad, and more.
